spreadsheet2keytemplates: Convert spreadsheet file to key templates
tab2keytemplates: Convert tab-separated file to key templates
excel2decisionkeytemplates-desc: Converts data (either tab-separated or Excel format) to templates used in decision keys (<nowiki>{{Key Start}}</nowiki>, <nowiki>{{Lead}}</nowiki> and <nowiki>{{ImageSwitch}}</nowiki>). New [[Special:SpecialPages|Special Pages]] are added for conversion. Depends on composer package phpoffice/phpexcel.
e2d_error_gawk: Error: Please install gawk. Could not locate this command line tool.
e2d_error_no_file_selected: ''Error: No file was selected, please specify one.''
e2d_error_output_file: Error: the file containing the converted templates was not found: '$1'
e2d_error_command_line:
Error: the command line returned the error code $1 while executing the following command:
$2
e2d_error_tempfile_not_writable: Error: could not write to temporary file $1 …
e2d_convert_resource-limits_phpexcel: Due to software restriction in PHPExcel a name of a spreadsheet can not be longer than 31 characters.
e2d_convert_fieldset-legend_apply-globll: Options, that can be specified for all templates
e2d_convert_imageswitch_layout_format_la: as layout form (image captions, defaut: 'top: link, bottom: text')
e2d_convert_selectfile: Please select the file ($1) to convert:
e2d_convert_convert_to_templateset: If the data matrix of the decision key is structured correctly, then the following templates can be generated:
e2d_convert_success_keystart_template: Copy the following text to the wiki page you want to contain it. A page you want to create can be accessed by performing a page searchusing the search box. After that you will see a link to create the new page.
